title: Andes Mint Cookies
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Andes Mint Cookies.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Andes Mint Cookies with text: hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - 2 cups flour - 2/3 cups cocoa powder - 1 tsp. baking soda - 1/2 tsp. salt - 3/4 cup butter - 3/4 cup br. sugar, wh. sugar - 2 eggs - 2 tsp. vanilla - 36 andes mints. Directions: - preheat oven 176 degrees Celsius (350 degrees Celsius [Fahrenheit]) - make dough - bake 8-10 min. (soft in center) - press andes mint in middle and spread with knife.
subject: cocoa powder; baking soda; salt; butter; brown sugar; white sugar; eggs; vanilla; andes mints

title: Apple Snack Cake
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Apple Snack Cake with a small illustration of an apple.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Apple Snack Cake with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - 113 grams (1/2 cup) butter - 200 grams (1 cup) sugar - 1 egg - 1 tsp. baking powder - 1/2 tsp. cinnamon - 250 grams (2 cups) apples - 125 grams (1 cup) flour. Icing: - water + powdered sugar. Directions: - Preheat oven to 176 degrees Celcius - 350 degrees Fahrenheit - combine butter + sugar - add baking powder - cinnamon - egg, add apples, add flour + extra pinch of cinnamon + sugar - bake 40-45 min.
subject: butter; sugar; eggs; baking powder; cinnamon; apples; flour; water; powdered sugar
diet: vegetarian; can be made dairy free
substitutions: replace butter with dairy free alternative

title: Blueberry Muffins
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Blueberry Muffins with blue background.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Blueberry Muffins with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - 1 1/2 cups flour - 3/4 cup white sugar - 1/2 tsp. salt - 2 tsp. baking powder - 1/3 [cup] vegetable oil - 1 egg - 1/3 cup milk - 1 cup blueberries. Directions: - preheat oven to 200 degrees Celsius (400 degrees Fahrenheit) - combine dry ingredients in bowl - combine oil and egg, then add enough milk to reach 1 cup mark - combine and mix all ingredients - fold in blueberries then ladle greased muffin tin - bake about 20 min.
subject: flour; white sugar; salt; baking powder; vegetable oil; eggs; milk; blueberries

title: Chinese Tomato Egg Stir Fry
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Chinese Tomato Egg Stir Fry.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Chinese Tomato Egg Stir Fry with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - tomatoes - eggs - oil - green onion - gralic - salt - soy sauce - sugar. Directions: - mix eggs with some salt - heat oil in wok - pour eggs in wok, briefly scramble - take eggs out - add oil, garlic, green onions - add tomatoes - add sauce - add eggs back in and scramble.
subject: tomatoes; eggs; oil; green onions; garlic; salt; soy sauce; sugar

title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
description: Photo of a handwritten recipe for Chocolate Chip Banana Bread.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Chocolate Chip Banana Bread with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: 3 ripe bananas - 75 grams melted butter - 100 grams sugar - 1 egg (beaten) - 1 tsp. vanilla - 1 tsp. baking soda - salt - 185 grams flour - 85 grams chocolate chips. Directions: - preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius - mix all ingredients - bake 50 min.
subject: bananas; butter; sugar; eggs; vanilla; baking soda; salt; flour; chocolate chips
diet: vegetarian; can be made dairy free
substitutions: replace milk with dairy free alternative; replace butter with dairy free alternative

title: Korean Chicken Stir Fry
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Dakgalbi.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Korean Chicken Stir Fry with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Chicken Marinade: - 1 lb. chicken - 2 tbsp. milk - 1 tbsp. soy sauce - 1/4 tsp. pepper. Seasoning Sauce: - 12 garlic cloves - 1 tsp. ginger - 2 tbsp. soy sauce - 1/2 cup water - 1/3 cup gochugaru - 2 tbsp. rice syrup (sugar) - 1/2 tsp. ground pepper. Veggie/Rice Cakes: - 1 cup rice cakes, soaked in cold water - 8 oz. cabbage - large onion - carrot - green chili pepper - 1/2 cup water - ramen noodles (optional) - potatoes (optional). Directions: - soak rice cakes - marinate chicken - prepare veggies and sauce - lay cabbage on bottom - put veggies, meat, sauce, etc. and 1/2 cup water.
subject: chicken; milk; soy sauce; pepper; garlic; ginger; water; gochu-garu; rice syrup; ground pepper; rice cakes; cabbage; onion; carrot; green chili pepper; ramen noodles (optional); potatoes (optional); cheese (optional)
substitutions: replace milk with dairy free alternative

title: Enchilada Sauce
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Enchilada Sauce.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Enchilada sauce with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. - 3 tbsp. olive oil - 3 tbsp. flour - 1 tbsp. chili powder - 1 tsp. garlic - 1/4 tsp. oregano - salt - cinnamon - 2 tblsp tomato paste - 2 cups broth - 1 tsp. vinegar - black pepper. - combine all dry ingredients in a cup - in a large pan, heat oil - pour in flour and spice mix - add tomato paste - slowly add broth while stirring - remove from heat add salt, pepper, and vinegar.
subject: olive oil; flour; chili powder; cumin; garlic; oregano; salt; cinnamon; tomato paste; broth; vinegar; black pepper

title: Guacamole Regio
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Guacamole Regio
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Guacamole Regio with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - avocado - tomato - onion - limes - cilantro - chicharrón ( fried pork belly) * not the puffy crispy kind! Directions: - scoop out the avocado - add sliced tomato, onion, cilantro, and chicharrón - add lime juice and salt to taste.
subject: avocado; tomato; onion; limes; cilantro; fried pork belly; salt

title: Kimchi Pancake
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Kimchi Pancake
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Kimchi Pancake with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - 226 grams kimchi - 2 tbs. brine - 3 scallions, onion - 1/2 tsp. sugar - 62 grams flour - 58 oz. water - oil. Directions: - mix ingredients together - heat pan and add oil - fry until crispy.
subject: kimchi; brine; scallions; onion; sugar; flour; water; oil

title: Turkish Tomato Egg Scramble
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Menemen. There is a small illustration of  the finished dish in the bottom righthand corner.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Menemen with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - 1 tbsp. olive oil - 1 small white onion - 1 large bell pepper - 15 oz. diced tomato - 1 tbsp. butter - 1 tsp. pepper - salt - 3 -4 eggs. Directions: - sautee veggies - add tomatoes, butter, salt and pepper - add eggs and scramble
subject: olive oil; white onion; bell pepper; tomato; butter; pepper; salt; eggs
substitutions: replace butter with extra olive oil or dairy free alternative

title: Turkish Lentil Soup
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Mercimek Corbasi.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Mercimek Corbasi with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - 3 tbs. oil - 1 onion - 1 tbs. flour - 1 carrot - 1 potato - 1 tsp salt - 1 tsp. pepper - 1 1/2 cup lentils - 6 cups water. Directions: - coursely chop onion, carrot, and potato - toss in pot w/ oil and flour - wash lentils and add to pot - season, then add water - close lid and cook for 40 min.
subject: oil; onion; flour; carrot; potato; salt; pepper; lentils

title: Pizza Dough and Pizza Sauce
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Pizza Dough and Pizza Sauce.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Pizza Dough and Pizza Sauce with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - 2 to 2 1/3 cups (250 to 295 grams) flour - 1 packet instant yeast (2 1/4 tsp.) - 1 1/2 tsp. sugar - 3/4 tsp. salt - 1/8 to 1/4 tsp. garlic powder/basil - 2 tbs. olive oil - 3/4 cups (175 ml) warm water. Directions: - combine 1 cup (125 gram) of flour, yeast, sugar, salt, garlic, and basil - add olive oil and warm water and stir with a wooden spoon - gradually add another cup (125 grams) of flour. Form into dough. - place in an oiled bowl and cover. Let rest/rise for 30 min. - once dough is made poke holes and place in oven at 215 degrees Celsius for 13-15 min. Pizza Sauce: - 3 tbsp. tomato paste - 1 can diced tomatoes - 1 tbsp. olive oil - garlic, vinegar, oregano, salt, brown sugar.
subject: flour; yeast; sugar; salt; garlic; basil; olive oil; water; tomato paste; diced tomatoes (canned); olive oil; vinegar; oregano; salt; brown sugar

title: Smashed Cucumber Salad
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Smashed Cucumber Salad. There are some small illustrations of sliced cucumber at the top of the photo.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Smashed Cucumber Salad with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - cucumbers - soy sauce - sriracha or peppers - vinegar - garlic - cilantro. Directions: - cut and crush cucumbers - add salt and let drain - make sauce with soy suace, sriracha, vinegar, garlic, cilantro.

title: Spinach Soup
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Spinach Soup.

title: Sugar Cookies
description: Photo of handwritten recipe for Sugar Cookies. Some water damage makes words difficult to read.
alt-text: Photo of handwritten recipe for Sugar Cookies with text. Hyphens used as bullet points. Ingredients: - 1 cup butter - 1 cup sugar - 3 eggs - 1 tsp. baking soda - 2 tsp. cream of tartar - 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla - 3 1/2 cups flour. Directions: - soften butter - cream butter and sugar - add eggs one at a time - add remain soda, cream of tartar, vanill - add flour and mix - chill overnight - roll and cut - bake at 218 degrees Celsius/425 degrees Fahrenheit. Frosting: Ingredients: - 1/2 cup butter - 3 cups powdered sugar - 1 tsp. vanilla - 2 tbs. milk
subject: butter; sugar; eggs; baking soda; cream of tartar; vanilla; flour; powdered sugar; milk
diet: vegetarian; can be made dairy free
substitutions: replace milk with dairy free alternative; replace butter with dairy free alternative; replace cream of tartar with lemon or lime juice
